articles.description: A sell out
articles.content: Sony enjoyed the biggest hardware launch ever in France last month, as the PlayStation 5 sold 107,000 units at launch. That narrowly edged out the previous record holder, the Nintendo Switch, which m… [+768 chars]

articles.author: By Danyal Hussain For Mailonline
articles.title: British businessman paid £1.8million 'kickback' to source PPE from China - Daily Mail
articles.description: Khalid Hassan, 38, owns Birmingham company Byte Technology, which specialises in mobile accessories and spare parts - though its latest accounts say it has assets of just £12,000.
articles.content:
A British phone accessories company owner was paid £1.8 million in 'kickbacks' to act as a middleman for the government and buy PPE from China. 
Khalid Hassan, 38, owns Birmingham company Byte Techn… [+3328 chars]

articles.author: Dion Dassanayake
articles.title: Microsoft Edge keeps pressure on Google Chrome by adding new sidebar search tool - Express
articles.description: MICROSOFT EDGE is keeping the pressure on Google Chrome by adding yet another feature you won't find on rival browsers.
articles.content:
This handy new tool can be found in Microsoft Edge version 87.0.664.5 or newer and the patch has been pushed out to the Edge stable channel.
As the name suggests, this tool lets users create a sideb… [+718 chars]
